mapper.insert: INSERT INTO medications (id, medication_name, medication_types_id) VALUES (#{id}, #{medicationName}, #{medicationTypesId})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.* FROM medications m JOIN prescriptions p ON m.id = p.medication_id JOIN treatments t ON p.treatment_id = t.id JOIN medical_records mr ON t.id = mr.treatment_id JOIN appointments a ON mr.appointment_id = a.id JOIN patients pt ON a.patient_id = pt.id WHERE pt.id = #{patientId}
